data.title: 17 alternative rock bands and solo artists from the Levant
data.meta_description: a fan of rock music in general, then I'm sure you'll be interested in a few of the bands and artists from the Levant (Syria, Jordan, Palestine & Lebanon)
data.text:
Alternative rock is a term that gets thrown around easily. But hey, if youâ€™re a fan of rock music in general, then Iâ€™m sure youâ€™ll be interested in a few of the bands and artists from the Levant (Syria, Jordan, Palestine & Lebanon) that I have compiled and listed down below.

The obvious ones in the list are Mashrouâ€™ Leila from Lebanon and Jadal from Jordan. But there are more bands and artists to check out apart from those two.

Some of them may not be producing music anymore but itâ€™s still worth checking their awesome music out. Folk, ska, reggae, psychedelic rock and even rapâ€¦Iâ€™m sure thereâ€™s at least a band thatâ€™s of your liking -read on to discover all of them ðŸ˜€
